abstracts.cdata!:
The project consists of: (a) supply and
            installation of the third unit (about 30 MW) at the
            Ahuachapan geothermal plant; (b) construction of about 39
            circuit-km of new 115 kV transmission lines; (c) conversion
            of about 83 circuit-km of existing 69 kV transmission lines
            of 115 kV; (d) construction of about 20 circuit-km of 46 kV
            subtransmission lines; (e) construction and / or improvement
            of 10 substations, including the addition of about 150 MVA
            to the system; (f) improvements and additions to CEL's
            communication and control system; (g) studies of other
            geothermal fields; and (h) about 500 man-months of
            consultants' services for tariff studies, geothermal
            studies, and detailed engineering and supervision of construction.
